DataElement.preferredName: Trunk And Extremities Soft Tissue Sarcoma AJCC Edition 8 Group Stage
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Stage group based on the combination of T, N, and M categories and relevant prognostic factors for soft tissue sarcoma of the trunk and extremities using AJCC Ed. 8 criteria.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Trunk And Extremities Soft Tissue Sarcoma Stage Grouping
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The body excluding the head and neck and limbs._An article which expresses the relation of connection or addition. It is used to conjoin a word with a word, a clause with a clause, or a sentence with a sentence._Body limbs, consisting of right upper and lower (arm and leg) and left upper and lower (arm and leg). (CADSR)_A malignant neoplasm arising from muscle tissue, adipose tissue, blood vessels, fibrous tissue, or other supportive tissues excluding the bones._An assessment based on the combined evaluation of the patient's T stage, M stage, and N stage, as well as prognostic parameters for specific cancers.

(CADSR):A malignant neoplasm arising from muscle tissue, adipose tissue, blood vessels, fibrous tissue, or other supportive tissues excluding the bones.

Property.preferredDefinition: Stage Grouping; an assessment based on the combined evaluation of the patient's T stage, M stage, and N stage. (caDSR)

Concepts.definition: An assessment based on the combined evaluation of the patient's T stage, M stage, and N stage, as well as prognostic parameters for specific cancers.

DataElementConcept.origin: AJCC Based:Staging Criteria Based on American Joint Committee on Cancer System
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: TL released; 2/24/22.; 4-2-19 created for AJCC Ed. 8; tmt.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Soft Tissue Sarcoma Trunk And Extremities American Joint Committee on Cancer Edition 8 Group Stage
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A term that refers to the staging of soft tissue sarcoma of the trunk and extremities, following the rules of the TNM AJCC v8 classification system._An assessment based on the combined evaluation of the patient's T stage, M stage, and N stage, as well as prognostic parameters for specific cancers._The extent of a cancer in the body. Staging is usually based on the size of the tumor, whether lymph nodes contain cancer, and whether the cancer has spread from the original site to other parts of the body.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Stage IV Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Stage IV Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Stage IV includes: (Any T, N1, M0, Any G); (Any T, Any N, M1, Any G). N1: Regional lymph node metastasis. M0: No distant metastasis. M1: Distant metastasis. (AJCC 8th ed.)

Concepts.longName: Stage IV Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
Concepts.definition: Stage IV includes: (Any T, N1, M0, Any G); (Any T, Any N, M1, Any G). N1: Regional lymph node metastasis. M0: No distant metastasis. M1: Distant metastasis. (AJCC 8th ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Stage IIIB Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Stage IIIB Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Stage IIIB includes: T3, T4, N0, M0, G2, G3. T3: Tumor measuring more than 10 cm and less than or equal to 15 cm in greatest dimension. T4: Tumor measuring more than 15 cm in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. G2: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 4 or 5. G3: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 6, 7, or 8. (AJCC 8th ed.)

Concepts.longName: Stage IIIB Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
Concepts.definition: Stage IIIB includes: T3, T4, N0, M0, G2, G3. T3: Tumor measuring more than 10 cm and less than or equal to 15 cm in greatest dimension. T4: Tumor measuring more than 15 cm in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. G2: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 4 or 5. G3: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 6, 7, or 8. (AJCC 8th ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Stage IIIA Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Stage IIIA Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Stage IIIA includes: T2, N0, M0, G2, G3. T2: Tumor measuring more than 5 cm and less than or equal to 10 cm in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. G2: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 4 or 5. G3: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 6, 7, or 8. (AJCC 8th ed.)

Concepts.longName: Stage IIIA Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
Concepts.definition: Stage IIIA includes: T2, N0, M0, G2, G3. T2: Tumor measuring more than 5 cm and less than or equal to 10 cm in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. G2: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 4 or 5. G3: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 6, 7, or 8. (AJCC 8th ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Stage III Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Stage III Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Stage III includes: IIIA: (T2, N0, M0, G2, G3); IIIB: (T3, T4, N0, M0, G2, G3). T2: Tumor measuring more than 5 cm and less than or equal to 10 cm in greatest dimension. T3: Tumor measuring more than 10 cm and less than or equal to 15 cm in greatest dimension. T4: Tumor measuring more than 15 cm in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. G2: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 4 or 5. G3: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 6, 7, or 8. (AJCC 8th ed.)

Concepts.longName: Stage III Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
Concepts.definition: Stage III includes: IIIA: (T2, N0, M0, G2, G3); IIIB: (T3, T4, N0, M0, G2, G3). T2: Tumor measuring more than 5 cm and less than or equal to 10 cm in greatest dimension. T3: Tumor measuring more than 10 cm and less than or equal to 15 cm in greatest dimension. T4: Tumor measuring more than 15 cm in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. G2: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 4 or 5. G3: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 6, 7, or 8. (AJCC 8th ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Stage II Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Stage II Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Stage II includes: T1, N0, M0, G2, G3. T1: Tumor measuring 5 cm or less in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. G2: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 4 or 5. G3: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 6, 7, or 8. (AJCC 8th ed.)

Concepts.longName: Stage II Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
Concepts.definition: Stage II includes: T1, N0, M0, G2, G3. T1: Tumor measuring 5 cm or less in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. G2: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 4 or 5. G3: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 6, 7, or 8. (AJCC 8th ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Stage IB Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Stage IB Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Stage IB includes: T2, T3, T4, N0, M0, G1, GX. T2: Tumor measuring more than 5 cm and less than or equal to 10 cm in greatest dimension. T3: Tumor measuring more than 10 cm and less than or equal to 15 cm in greatest dimension. T4: Tumor measuring more than 15 cm in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. GX: Grade cannot be assessed. G1: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 2 or 3. (AJCC 8th ed.)

Concepts.longName: Stage IB Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
Concepts.definition: Stage IB includes: T2, T3, T4, N0, M0, G1, GX. T2: Tumor measuring more than 5 cm and less than or equal to 10 cm in greatest dimension. T3: Tumor measuring more than 10 cm and less than or equal to 15 cm in greatest dimension. T4: Tumor measuring more than 15 cm in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. GX: Grade cannot be assessed. G1: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 2 or 3. (AJCC 8th ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Stage IA Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Stage IA Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Stage IA includes: T1, N0, M0, G1, GX. T1: Tumor measuring 5 cm or less in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. GX: Grade cannot be assessed. G1: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 2 or 3. (AJCC 8th ed.)

Concepts.longName: Stage IA Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
Concepts.definition: Stage IA includes: T1, N0, M0, G1, GX. T1: Tumor measuring 5 cm or less in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. GX: Grade cannot be assessed. G1: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 2 or 3. (AJCC 8th ed.)

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Stage I Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Stage I Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Stage I includes: IA: (T1, N0, M0, G1, GX); IB: (T2, T3, T4, N0, M0, G1, GX). T1: Tumor measuring 5 cm or less in greatest dimension. T2: Tumor measuring more than 5 cm and less than or equal to 10 cm in greatest dimension. T3: Tumor measuring more than 10 cm and less than or equal to 15 cm in greatest dimension. T4: Tumor measuring more than 15 cm in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. GX: Grade cannot be assessed. G1: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 2 or 3. (AJCC 8th ed.)

Concepts.longName: Stage I Soft Tissue Sarcoma of the Trunk and Extremities AJCC v8
Concepts.definition: Stage I includes: IA: (T1, N0, M0, G1, GX); IB: (T2, T3, T4, N0, M0, G1, GX). T1: Tumor measuring 5 cm or less in greatest dimension. T2: Tumor measuring more than 5 cm and less than or equal to 10 cm in greatest dimension. T3: Tumor measuring more than 10 cm and less than or equal to 15 cm in greatest dimension. T4: Tumor measuring more than 15 cm in greatest dimension. N0: No regional lymph node metastasis or unknown lymph node status. M0: No distant metastasis. GX: Grade cannot be assessed. G1: Total differentiation, mitotic count and necrosis score of 2 or 3. (AJCC 8th ed.)
